attr.title: The Final Boss
attr.desc: Play as the Final Boss and crush waves of heroes invading your lair. Features 6 bosses across fantasy, space, and modern scenarios in an '80s-style arcade tribute with unlockable Endless Mode.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://carloc.itch.io/the-final-boss) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1049670/The_Final_Boss). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the thefinalboss/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://carloc.itch.io/the-final-boss) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1049670/The_Final_Boss). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the `thefinalboss/gamedata` folder.
